Package com.strongholds.game.view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strongholds.game.view.AbstractView
      • com.strongholds.game.view.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameView
    public class GameView
extends AbstractView
implements IGameView
    View displayed when the game started

      • msgPosition

        private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 msgPosition
        position of the game message It starts in the left-bottom corner. Goes to the middle when the game is finished.
